lines.text: sentiment to secure domestic legitimacy against
Internal failures
· Lacking international recognition, Taliban uses 'Pakistan.
bashing to prove it is not foreign controlled, gaining
Support from an Afghan public with historical anti-
Pakistan grievances
· Externalizing the issue: externalizes internal crisis
(economic trouble + ISKP resistance) by blaming Pakistani
interference , positioning itself as 'defender of Afghan dignity'
· Defying Pakistan appeases the rock and file fighters,
Who view Pakistan as a western'collaborator?>
helping to prevent defections to more radical groups
3) Implications of TTP. Taliban nezus for Pakistan's
Internal security
3.1) TTP's strategic depth in Taliban led Kabul: Taliban's
non cooperation in decapitating a hostile terrorist outfit
perpetuates a cycle of insurgency in Pakistan
· Taliban views TTP as an 'ideological extension">
making a crackdown a violation of Pashtun codes & a
risk to internal unity
· This protection racket' provides Til a permanent;
untouchable rear base in Afghanistan, reducing
Pakistani counter-terrorism operations to dealing
with symptoms while leadership remains safe
across the border.
CamScanner

ocr_full_text_page: sentiment to secure domestic legitimacy against Internal failures · Lacking international recognition, Taliban uses 'Pakistan. bashing to prove it is not foreign controlled, gaining Support from an Afghan public with historical anti- Pakistan grievances · Externalizing the issue: externalizes internal crisis (economic trouble + ISKP resistance) by blaming Pakistani interference , positioning itself as 'defender of Afghan dignity' · Defying Pakistan appeases the rock and file fighters, Who view Pakistan as a western'collaborator?> helping to prevent defections to more radical groups 3) Implications of TTP. Taliban nezus for Pakistan's Internal security 3.1) TTP's strategic depth in Taliban led Kabul: Taliban's non cooperation in decapitating a hostile terrorist outfit perpetuates a cycle of insurgency in Pakistan · Taliban views TTP as an 'ideological extension"> making a crackdown a violation of Pashtun codes & a risk to internal unity · This protection racket' provides Til a permanent; untouchable rear base in Afghanistan, reducing Pakistani counter-terrorism operations to dealing with symptoms while leadership remains safe across the border. CS CamScanner
